description:
Elements of statics; mechanical behavior of materials; equilibrium equations, strains and displacements, and stress-strain relations. Elementary applications to trusses, bending of beams, pressure vessels, and torsion of bars.
Prerequisites: PHYS 180 or 200, and MATH 115.
title: Mechanical Engineering I: Stre...
long_title: Mechanical Engineering I: Strength and Deformation of Mechanical Elements
